attributes.action: Allow Police Officers To Carry Lethal Weapons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would cut the deaths of police officers on patrol and out on the beat. If this were to come into force less officers would be killed and youth gun crime would go down if they knew the police could retaliate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
